text.title: At least 107 killed in Mecca crane collapse
text.head: At least 107 killed in Mecca crane collapse
Sister links
Sources

list.item: Ali Abdelaty, Mostafa Hashem, and Yara Bayoumy. "At least 107 killed by falling crane at Grand Mosque in Mecca" — Reuters , September 11, 2015
Salim Essaid, Ralph Ellis, and Jason Hanna. "107 killed in crane collapse at Mecca's Grand Mosque" — CNN , September 11, 2015
AP. "Crane Collapse at Mecca's Grand Mosque Kills at Least 107 People" — NBC News , September 11, 2015
